text: Hello! I am an associate profesor at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. I am starting to use Julia in some of my projects in aerospace engineering (space plasma propulsion modeling, mainly). Shocked about the beauty and utility of Julia so far!

attachments.title: Julia and the satellite Amazonia-1
attachments.text: Hi guys! Long time, no see! As some of you may know, I am the mission architect and the technical responsible for the attitude and orbit control subsystem (AOCS) of the Brazilian satellite Amazonia-1, launched on Feb 28. This is an image obtained by the first recording procedure: Here you can see the big city of São Paulo (on the left), São José dos Campos where INPE is located (“small” city on the top right), and the beautiful Brazilian shore, showing Santos, Guarujá, Bertioga, São Sebast...
attachments.fallback: JuliaLang: Julia and the satellite Amazonia-1
